recipes.name: Scallop Pasta
recipes.ingredients: 1lb scallops, Salt, 12oz pasta, 4 cloves of garlic, 3oz of butter, 1/3cup of dry white wine, chopped parsely
recipes.instructions: Soak the scallops for 10 minutes in a brine solution (3 Tbsp Kosher salt in 16 oz water.) Remove after 10 minutes and place on a rack to dry. Cook pasta to package instructions. Heat oil over medium-high heat, sear scallops 1 to 2 minutes on each side before adding garlic and parsely. Lower heat, and add in the butter, add the wine and turn down heat to keep warm.

recipes.name: Cucumber Salad
recipes.ingredients: 1 peeled english cucumber, 3 cloves minced garlic, 1Tbsp rice wine vinegar, 1Tbsp light soy sauce, 1tsp sugar, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/2tsp sesame oil, 2tsp chili oil
recipes.instructions: Dry cucumber with a paper towel and crush or cut into bite sized pieces and place into a bowl. Add the garlic. In another bowl, add vinegar, soy sauce, sugar, salt, and sesame oil and mix well. When ready to serve, pour sauce over cucumber and add chili oil as desired.

recipes.name: Peanut Butter and Jelly
recipes.ingredients: 2 slices of bread, peanut butter, jelly
recipes.instructions: Spread peanut butter on one piece of bread. Spread jelly on other side of other piece of bread. Putting jelly and peanut butter together, put both pieces together. Serve with milk.

recipes.name: Thai Coconut Soup
recipes.ingredients: 1tbsp vegtable oil, 2tbsp grated ginger, 1 stalk minced lemon grass, 2tsp red curry paste, 4 cups chicken broth, 3 tablespoons fish sauce, 1tbsp light brown sugar, 3 cans coconut milk, 1/2lb sliced shitake mushrooms, 1lb medium shrimp, 2tbsp lime juice, 1/4cup fresh cilantro
recipes.instructions: Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat. Cook and stir the ginger, lemongrass, and curry paste in the heated oil for 1 minute. Slowly pour the chicken broth over the mixture, stirring continually. Stir in the fish sauce and brown sugar; simmer for 15 minutes. Stir in the coconut milk and mushrooms; cook and stir until the mushrooms are soft, about 5 minutes. Add the shrimp; cook until no longer translucent about 5 minutes. Stir in the lime juice; season with salt; garnish with cilantro.

recipes.name: Tomatillo Salsa Verde
recipes.ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds tomatillos, 1/2 cup chopped white onion, 2 cloves garlic (optional), 1/2 cup chopped cilantro, 1tbsp fresh lime juice, 2 jalape√±o or serrano peppers, salt to taste
recipes.instructions: Cut the tomatillos in half and place cut side down on a foil-lined baking sheet. Add a few garlic cloves in their skin (if using) Place under a broiler for about 5-7 minutes to lightly blacken the skins of the tomatillos. Place the cooked tomatillos, lime juice, onions, garlic (if using), cilantro, chili peppers in a blender or food processor and pulse until all ingredients are finely chopped and mixed. Season to taste with salt.

recipes.name: SeafoodPasta7
recipes.ingredients: 1lb scallops, Salt, 12oz pasta, 4 cloves of garlic, 3oz of butter, 1/3cup of dry white wine,chopped parsely
recipes.instructions: Soak the scallops for 10 minutes in a brine solution (3 Tbsp Kosher salt in 16 oz water.) Remove after 10 minutes and place on a rack to dry. Cook pasta to package instructions. Heat oil over medium-high heat, sear scallops 1 to 2 minutes on each side before adding garlic and parsely. Lower heat, and add in the butter, add the wine and turn down heat to keep warm.
